statements: UPDATE EnergyDistribution SET energy_demand = 200 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE EnergyDistribution SET location = 'Building A' WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE EnergyDistribution SET day_of_week = 'Saturday', time_slot = '10:00:00' WHERE id = 3;
UPDATE EnergyDistribution SET energy_demand = energy_demand + 10 WHERE location = 'New York'
UPDATE EnergyDistribution SET energy_demand = energy_demand * 1.2 WHERE day_of_week = 'Monday'
UPDATE EnergyDistribution SET energy_demand = energy_demand - 5 WHERE time_slot = '08:00:00'

UPDATE energy_distribution SET distribution_time = '2023-07-20 12:30:00' WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE EnergyConsumption SET consumption = 150 WHERE consumer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE EnergyProduction SET production_amount = 200 WHERE producer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
UPDATE EnergyDistribution SET distribution_amount = 100, cost = 50 WHERE distribution_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174002';
UPDATE EnergyConsumption SET consumption = consumption + 100 WHERE consumer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE EnergyProduction SET production_amount = production_amount * 1.1, timestamp = NOW() WHERE producer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';

UPDATE EnergyDistribution SET distribution_amount = distribution_amount - 50, cost = cost + 10 WHERE distribution_center_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174002' AND consumer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
